line.comment: * Mayhem 3 Zero Hour main script
* first check after 12h
* main faction tables
* territory
* $pirateTopLimit global variable
* ** Global data
* territory main factions
* no dead factions, no Player before his first sector and no Yaki before their revolution
* military main factions
* averages between all main factions
* portal distance excludes player
* Xenon territory size
* OCV military score
* **** NPC ONLY below *****
* rubberbanding spec bonus for main factions based on comparison with Terraformers
* ** FACTIONS
* get saved data from the last cycle
* FREIGHTERS - how many % of our previous ships did we loose recently?
* territory size comparison to other commonwealth factions
* military power comparison to other commonwealth factions
* OCV portal distance comparison to other commonwealth factions
* OCV/Xenon in our sectors
* Hostiles in our alerted but not claimed sectors (including OCV/Xenon)
* example: Khaak Queen fleet has about 20 average strength
* *** SPECIALIZATION - dynamic Outpost production 'rubberbanding' ***
* race territory
* race military
* resource reserve 0 = starving, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high
* *** STRATEGIC AI ***
* we can only leave defense mode once we have built a big military
* if we were not defensive before we always start with neutral stance
* the champion cares a lot less about caution or defense
* running out of resources
* we need to reduce our offense
* we have become weaker than average and want peace
* too small to continue offense ?
* Overextension (large territory but weak military)
* we go in full defense panic mode
* we need to reduce our offense so that our small military can still defend our many sectors
* we are still fine as long as we have lots of resources left
* once we start running low we better make peace
* we are only worried once we start running low on resources
* we are undisputed champion (can be reckless)
* we are among the strongest factions and rich (can be confident)
* BE SMART!
* the champion doesn't need to until he starts running out of resources
* non-Faction war (only enemies in unclaimed sectors!)
* 40% of ourfleet power! (panic mode, full defense)
* 20% of our fleet power! (do less offensive faction war)
* its not just lots of weak ships!
* our secondary enemies are so weak that we can be more aggressive in the faction war if we also got spare resources
* PIRATE problem?
* if we didn't loose freighters we cannot have a pirate problem!
* how many pirates would be appropriate vs. our reality
* we order extra Police squadrons if we have resources or more Escorts if not. But if the pirates are really troublesome we don't need spare resources.
* pirates trouble us so much that we generally get more cautious and want peace with everyone
* XENON/OCV
* we can never bother until some Terraformers roam through our territory and we lost some freighters
* our sectors are very close to the OCV portal
* we are already cautious or generally want peace
* Portal is too far away for us to care
* they need to send stronger fleets with capships. And did we even loose freighters recently?
* Portal still further away than average
* they need to send stronger fleets with capships
* Galactic Protector
* we always need resources. Then many sectors and military, or be closer to the OCV portal
* something has put us into full defense panic mode
* with at least low resources we order an extra rearguard to ensure our survival
* once we have saved up some resources we start ordering extra battlegroups for our future counterattack
* vote for Terracorp to declare anti-Xenon alliance
* do if $ZHchance.base
* chance based
* Offensive strategy
* Rearguard focus
* Freighter kills
* Terracorp declaring 'Zero Hour' (Xenon Crisis)
* do if ($XenonVsMain.p > 30 AND $OCVvsMain.p > 15) OR $OCVvsMain.p > 30
* Terracorp panicking
